name: Large Crate of Contained Mesarchonite
description:
A coarse-looking, dark red mineral with a geodic structure containing translucent crystals of the same color. Its radioactive properties require the material to be stored in special containment units; handling by anyone other than a trained engineer is strongly discouraged.

Mesarchonite is used primarily in stationside security networks, mostly in the systems which detect interference or tampering along the audio-visual lines.
